banner.title:
We put Paris Nord-Est
in a cap.

productGrid.empty: No products available at the moment.

footer.title: Here we make cool stuff for your head
footer.description: No gimmicks, no lies, just real caps designed with love, made to follow you on your adventures – because a cap is stylish. It's fun, but also serious. Not a joke. No BS, just style that reigns supreme, materials that will last. And we make it all in Saint-Denis, because even caps need a little Parisian energy.
